column2: found in [[the Shire]] and [[Bree]]. Known members of the family are [[Eglantine Banks]]
column6: who was killed in the battles against [[Ruffians|the strangers]] who attacked Bree early in {{TA|3019}}.<ref>{{RK|VI7}}</ref>

column1: The name is topographical in the sense "steep slope or hill-side".<ref name="Nomen">[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column2: "[[Guide to the Names in The Lord of the Rings|Nomenclature of The Lord of the Rings]]" in [[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]] (eds)
